page.title: 12A MIXED FARM
page.content: Mr. Burgess owns a farm of over 200 acres, of which 3 acres are taken by farm buildings. He has lived there for 11 years although the house is 120 years old. His day starts at 7-30am. He has various types of cattle,Fresian milking cows and Hereford beef cattle which he breeds and sells at Uttoxeter market. He also has 200 sheep and sells them at market. He has 3 chickens which have laid 1 egg to date. At the moment he is growing 23 acres of Barley, and grows and produces his own Hay and Straw, which he tends with 4 tractors, 2 hay bailers, 1 fertilizer spreader,1 plough and many other types of machinery. He is a mixed farmer who enjoys farming with cows when he feeds the lambs, and likes farming with lambs when he feeds the cows!!
